entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

feature.name: startTime
feature.title: Period start time
feature.description: Start date of the period of smoking

feature.name: endTime
feature.title: Period end time
feature.description: End date of the period of smoking

feature.name: code
feature.title: Smoking status code
feature.description: A SNOMED code representing the individual's smoking status.
